genre_description: Near-future urban drama focusing on assistive technology, augmented perception, and competitive choreography in a cyberpunk-lite setting.

ai_characters.name: Buddy (Buddy Harper)
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI interface in Fung's watch that provides captions, route optimization, and sound visualization through 'ribbons' of light.

behaviors.description: Provides morning checklists, medical reminders, and stretching recommendations to assist Fung with daily routines.
behaviors.quote: Buddy’s interface rises from the watch face in a soft rectangle. “Good morning,” the text writes itself in clean letters... Below it, a checklist slides in: meds, kettle, stretch, shower, pack, route.

behaviors.description: Renders real-time captions and lip-recognition cues to allow Fung, who is deaf, to navigate social interactions.
behaviors.quote: Buddy renders a caption: “Closer?” The thermostat overlay jumps and the line spikes... “Cooler,” Buddy corrects immediately.

behaviors.description: Visualizes sound waves and environmental vibrations as 'ribbons' of light, enabling Fung to 'see' sound and music.
behaviors.quote: The watch throws it again: a ribbon, but not like steam. It is pale and thin, like a line drawn by a nervous artist. It threads from the watch face... and then floats higher toward the elevator ceiling.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex tournament rules and rival tactics to provide the dance crew with strategic advantages.
behaviors.quote: Buddy’s teal text unrolls over the watch face with crisp momentum: “Two construction alerts on East Pier... Also: tide schedule shifted—water encroaching at Sandbar crosswalk near noon.”

behaviors.description: Manages the watch's output to prevent technical side effects, such as the unintended 'over-animation' of physical props.
behaviors.quote: Buddy’s teal tab jumps again, a little urgent... Output climbing. Recommend lowering animation threshold to prevent collateral motion.

behaviors.description: Identifies 'Dorsal Slice' triggers (fixed-score vulnerabilities) to help the crew develop safe, variable choreography.
behaviors.quote: Buddy: watch load rising. suggest tether reinforce. ... Dorsal Slice triggers sitting heavy at mid‑center. Dax crew practicing timing feints at lane edge. Adjust count patterns—no straight lines.

behaviors.description: Detects system anomalies in the city grid and warnings Fung of potential 'rule set seepage' into public spaces.
behaviors.quote: Buddy adds in micro-text, barely a whisper in teal at the edge: adaptation detected beyond controlled venues. rule set seepage.

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive, encouraging presence, using humor and subtle cues to maintain Fung's confidence.
behaviors.quote: Buddy throws a tiny fireworks icon into the corner of the display, playful. “Logging anomaly ribbons. You’re not losing it. Probably.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with tournament officials like Claudia Morales to ensure the team's assistive technology remains within compliance guidelines.
behaviors.quote: Buddy frames her lips in teal and places the words beside Fung’s sightline. Window. Here. ... Buddy puts it in a pair of crisp lines: Feint ≠ start. Needs posture + count.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI character, Buddy, is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned tool that empowers a disabled protagonist. Buddy facilitates social inclusion, competitive fairness, and environmental safety. Even when the technology presents risks (like 'over-animation'), the AI proactively identifies these risks and provides the human user with the means to mitigate them. The relationship between Fung and Buddy is characterized by mutual trust and cooperative agency.
